DOC.brief_summary: Selective Laser Trabeculoplasty (SLT) is known to reduce intraocular pressure in glaucoma patients. This study investigates, if there are changes in different ocular hemodynamic parameters prior and after SLT.
DOC.brief_title: Selective Lasertrabeculoplasty and Ocular Hemodynamics in Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: Ocular blood flow, ocular pulse amplitude and ocular pulse volume are measured with the Blood Flow Analyzer (Paradigm Medical Industries, Inc.) prior and 3 month after SLT.
DOC.criteria: glaucoma patient over 18 years needs further intraocular pressure regulation age under 18 years debilitated no glaucoma
